diff.patch:
Added ProfileGroup as nested class inside ServerGroup to create `server profile` command hierarchy:

```csharp
[Group(Name = "server")]
[Description("Remote server connection commands")]
public class ServerGroup 
{
    [Group(Name = "profile")]
    [Description("Manage server connection profiles")]
    public class ProfileGroup { }
}
```

Nested class pattern enables auto-detection by CommandRegistryBuilder via DeclaringType.
